    Class
    Description
    org.jboss.modcluster.container.catalina.standalone.ModClusterListener
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.builder.AdvertiseConfigurationBuilder.setAdvertiseInterface(InetAddress)
    Use AdvertiseConfigurationBuilder.setAdvertiseInterface(java.net.NetworkInterface) instead.
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.impl.MCMPHandlerConfigurationImpl.getProxies()
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.impl.MCMPHandlerConfigurationImpl.isSsl()
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.impl.ModClusterConfig.getProxies()
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.impl.ModClusterConfig.isSsl()
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.impl.ModClusterConfig.setProxies(Collection<InetSocketAddress>)
    Since 1.3.1.Final use ModClusterConfig.setProxyConfigurations(java.util.Collection) instead.
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.MCMPHandlerConfiguration.getProxies()
    As of 1.3.1.Final use MCMPHandlerConfiguration.getProxyConfigurations() to also specify local bind address.
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.MCMPHandlerConfiguration.isSsl()
    Use MCMPHandlerConfiguration.getSocketFactory() instead.
    org.jboss.modcluster.mcmp.impl.DefaultMCMPHandler.addProxy(InetSocketAddress)
    org.jboss.modcluster.mcmp.impl.DefaultMCMPHandler.addProxy(InetSocketAddress, boolean)
    org.jboss.modcluster.mcmp.MCMPHandler.addProxy(InetSocketAddress)
    See MCMPHandler.addProxy(org.jboss.modcluster.config.ProxyConfiguration)
    org.jboss.modcluster.mcmp.MCMPHandler.addProxy(InetSocketAddress, boolean)
    See MCMPHandler.addProxy(org.jboss.modcluster.config.ProxyConfiguration, boolean)
